lines.text: [crossing the desert]
I wish there was a boardwalk on this beach. If I had some bread I'd make a sandwich if I had a which...

[toying around]
Look, look, look, see!
Huh?
[With a laugh, Abu Hassan steals Popeye's belt]
Hey, give me back me belt, I paid a good price for that!... Okay, watch this one. Abba-dabba-dabba!
[Popeye pulls out Abu Hassan's underwear]
Abu Hassan got them anymore!
You want to make fool from me, eh?
Ah, nature beat me to it!
Open sesame!

[hidden, waiting for Abu Hassan]
Open what?
[a secret door opens and Abu and his thieves go in]

[rushing up]
Wait for me! Wait for me!
Close sesame!
[the door shuts just as Popeye reaches it]
I wonder what that word was he used when he opened this door? Open sissy! Open sayso! Ah, that can't be it.
[charges at the door, but it won't budge]
It's givin' way, it's givin' way! No, that was me givin' way.
[the trio come across a red light in the desert]
Rest!
[they rest for a minute, the light turns green and they proceed on]
Come on, we got the green light with us, You know, I could go for an ice cold chocolate soda right now...
[Abu Hassan traps Popeye in a chandelier]
Whoa, I'm burning the candle at both ends!

[in a chandelier]
Hey, what am I hanging around here for?
[Popeye carves an opening into Abu Hassan's hideout]
It's a violation for not having no exit which you can go into...

[to Abu Hassan]
Hey, you gotta give back all them jewels to the people you took!
[notices a chained Wimpy]
Oh, hello, Wimpy. How did you get in here, young fella?
[kicks a chicken over to Wimpy]
[Popeye can't stand it anymore, and pulls out a can of spinach]
Open, says me!
[the can magically opens]
[first lines]
[Abu Hassan and his forty thieves ride across the desert]

[singing]
You better lock up your doors today / 'cause Abu Hassan is on his way / Go in hiding, when I go riding / Just me and the 40 thieves! / Your wives and children, and money too / I'll steal them from you before I'm through / I'm out gunning, so start running / From me and the forty thieves! Abu Hassan!
Abu Hassan!
My game's the toughest / But I'm the roughest / and that's how I'm / Abu Hassan!
Abu Hassan!
You've got to hand it, to this bad bandit / Cause I'm a terrible guy!
Abu Hassan! Abu Hassan!
[flying a seaplane]
clearo!

[looking at the foreign menu]
Hey, what is this, double billing? I didn't send out any laundry. I can read reading, but I can't read writing. This writing is wrote rotten, if you happen to ask me...

[to the waiter]
Hey, this Chinese is Greek to me! Haven't you got something to eat?
[the waiter folds the menu into an English-reading version]
Oh, that's better. Bring me some dessert without any sand in it, and some sandwiches there...
[riding to the citadel]

[singing]
Abu Hassan!
Abu Hassan!
When things get quiet, I start a riot / As I go by / Abu Hassan!

[snorting]
Abu Hassan!
And you'll discover, and run for cover / That I'm a terrible guy!
Giddup horsy!
[charges at Popeye]

[fists up]
Come on!
Hat!
[steals Popeye's hat as he passes by him]

[disoriented]
There must be a gale wind blowing through here someplace...
Shirt!
[passes by Popeye again, and takes his shirt off him]
Shirt?... SHIRT! Hey, gimme back me shirt! What's the big idea? Stop, in the name of the Coast Guard!
[grabs Abu Hassan, pulls him off his horse and gets back his hat and shirt]
Oh, you little tough, eh?

[flattered]
I make a pretty good model, huh? Take me home for a dollar ninety-eight, for half the price. How good is that?
[making a getaway]

[singing]
Abu Hassan! Abu Hassan! Now make no error / I'm all the terror / of every village and town!

[mounts a camel]
Taxi! Taxi! Follow that Abracadabra Hassan guy over there! Come on, get going!
[the camel rises and begins a languid walk]
You're way ahead of them! Attaboy! Show 'em your heels!... What's the matter with you, you sick or something?
[looks at the camel's feet]
Hey, you got four flats! No wonder you can't run! Come on, there, camel cakes, step on it! Let's get going!
[pumping a camel full of water]
Boy, you eat up an awful lot of gas for only a two-cylinder!
Come on, the whole forty of you, I'll take you on one at a time!
[Popeye is thrown down a well]
Hey, what is this, a wishing well or something? I wish I was out of this place, that's what I wish...
[a shark appears and makes several leaps to bite Popeye]
Whoa! It's just a little flounder... Whoa! It's just a little snapper... Whoa! Hey, if you love me, I'll bite your teeth out! Whoa!... Oh, yeah?
[sees the forty thieves laughing at him from above]
Oh, boy, somebody's gonna be sorry for this!
[claps the shark's jaws shut]
That'll hold you for a while!
[the forty thieves attack in fives]

[delivering punches]
Five, ten, fifteen, twenty, twenty-five, thirty, thirty-five, forty!
[Ten of Hassan's best thieves form a phalanx]
Oh, yeah?
[turns into a bowling ball and knocks down the ten guards]
How does that strike you?
[last lines]
[Popeye, Olive and Wimpy return all the stolen goods to the citadel, in a carriage driven by Abu Hassan and his forty thieves]
I may be a shorty, but I licked the forty / I'm Popeye the Sailor Man!

[points at a police station]
I'll ask in there for bandits...
[then points to a cafe]
...but first we'll go in there for a cup of cafe.

[hiding in Abu Hassan's clothes]
Here I am! Over here! Peekaboo! I see you!
[punches Hassan repeatedly]
[Popeye is on patrol at a Coast Guard Station, with Olive and Wimpy keeping him company]
Popeye, come here, I've got a surprise!
[kisses him]

[jolted]
Left guard, right, front and center!
[Olive kisses him again]

[jolted]
As you were, attention, right side up!
Oooh, if you aren't just too-too...!
Attention everybody! Alarm! Abu Hassan the bandit has escaped, last seen headed thataway!
Whichaway?

[a finger popping out]
Thataway!
[steals Wimpy's hamburger]
Whoa! Man the arms!
[starts a seaplane]
[the seaplane's engine coughs and splutters]
Maybe I should trade this in...
[the seaplane breaks down in mid-air]
Something is definitely wrong... I'm right, that's wrong!
Popeye, Olive Oyl has collapsed completely!
Whoa! Come on, keep your back up tight, Olive!
[makes Olive walk on fours like a camel]
[the forty thieves attack in twos]

[delivering punches]
Two, four, six, eight, ten, twelve, fourteen, sixteen, eighteen, twenty, twenty-two, twenty-four, twenty-six, twenty-eight, thirty, thirty-two, thirty-four, thirty-six, thirty-eight, forty!
[Popeye and Wimpy leave in a seaplane to capture Abu Hassan]
You're taking me! You're taking me! Wait for me!
[grabs the seaplane by its tail as it takes off, Wimpy helps her inside]
This ain't nothing for women! We're out hunting bandits!
[searching for Abu Hassan in a seaplane]
Maybe we better try across the strait...
[in the desert, Wimpy sees a table laden with... ]
FOOD!
[rushes forwards, but it disappears]
Oh, what a disappointment.
Oh, Wimpy... would you care to join us, young fella? You know, that's just one of them invisible garages that you can't see on the desert, that's all.
Come on Olive, we got to save women and children from bandits! I'll get you out of this desert someway!
[ties the trio's hands and legs together to form a human tank tread, and gets it running]
I tank she's home now!
[arriving in town]

[seeing a water pump]
Water! Oh boy! Come on, I'll revise yez!
[at a cafe]

[bangs the table]
SERVICE!
Yeah, that's what we want, service!

[bangs the table]
SERVICE!
[looking at a waiter with a large turban]
Honeywax, huh?
[Wimpy is unknowingly robbed of sausages, twice]
What, another illusion? I can't understand it...

[emerging from a vase]
Oh, I think I'll get out of here now...
[sees bandits approaching]
Ooh, I'd better stay!
[climbs back in]
[carried off by Abu Hassan's bandits]
Popeye, they're taking me away, because they like me! They like me, they're taking me away and I don't like it...!
[a bandit shoves a boot on Olive's head to shut her up]
[repeated line used by each thief]

[hands garments to Olive]
Washy!
[in a fight, Popeye is knocked into Olive's washing tub]
Oh, this washing is getting heavier and heavier then I ca...
[hangs Popeye on the line then realizes it's him]
OH! POPEYE!
[Hugs him]
My darling, my sweetheart!
[Popeye eats spinach and rushes up the well]
WATCH OUT!
[scatters Abu Hassan and the thieves]
